hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\blueE3$ tens and $\blueE8$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/7627826f70245d1e2ee7409c7824620a9c59c9d5)

There are $\blueE{38}$ blocks.

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD2$ tens and $\maroonD{9}$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/35d27dcd559e58bee28087ac3ab194642d250941)

So, we are subtracting $\maroonD{29}$ blocks.

When we subtract $\blueE{38}-\maroonD{29}$, the difference is $\blueE{9}$ blocks.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1d0d53c9de13a9f28dfbcca81d16ce90ebb3800d)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$38- 29 = 9$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/492e29c5e2ba7cb0bd8768c2cf94a95dbb3bebce)

[[☃ radio 1]]
